about_the_game:
In this 2D horror game play a collection of three short stories all confined within a single package. SHOOT your way to survival, PLATFORM your way to victory, and EXPLORE a distant but familiar city! Just whatever you do, stay off circus grounds!!! (It's private property.)

Some people have better luck than others.....For Wilson, Yvonne, and Oscar this statement couldn't be more true.

ARCHIVE #1:

With nowhere to run or hide, Wilson must play a game of life or death against a monster that punishes past transgression.

You play as Wilson, a middle-aged man trapped in what can only be described as a fever dream. With no help from the outside world, Wilson must survive the unrelenting hunt, armed with only a flashlight, the FuntimeBlaster, and your wits, you will have to help him escape a fate far worse than death.

ARCHIVE #2:

Returning home after being away for five years, Yvonne begins her brand new start at life again.

You play as Yvonne, a college graduate who returns home to the grey world of Jacana City, seeking to start anew and reconnect with the friends she left behind. To her surprise, she learns that week marks the nineteenth anniversary since the tragedy that scarred their onced beloved city. Dress for the "event", prepare a dish, and greet forgotten faces....

ARCHIVE #3:

After years of working at a dead-end job, Oscar turns to the life of a thief and a friend to get his life back on track...

[img]{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/_AreyouReady.PNG][img]

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
